hadiths.text: Abu Tufail reported:I said to Ibn 'Abbas (Allah be pleased with them): People are of the view that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) moved quickly round the House and between al-Safa and al-Marwa, and (thus) it is Sunnah. He said: They told the truth and they told the lie

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِحْبَابِ الرَّمَلِ فِي الطَّوَافِ وَالْعُمْرَةِ وَفِي الطَّوَافِ الأَوَّلِ فِي الْحَجِّ
chapter.eng-name: Raml (walking rapidly) is recommended in the Tawaf of Umrah, and in the first Tawaf of Hajj
